physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a building with a cupola at the centre of the photograph. The allegory of the sculpture of Lady Justice is also visible below the cupola. The building consists of a portico as well as colonnades. There are numerous windows that are dome-shaped as well.
